docs.snippet: President Donald Trump on Sunday ramped up his criticism of a federal judge who blocked a travel ban on seven mainly Muslim nations and said courts were making U.S. border security harder, intensifying the first major legal battle of his presidenc...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump on Sunday ramped up his criticism of a federal judge who blocked a travel ban on seven mainly Muslim nations and said courts were making U.S. border security harder, intensifying the first major legal battle of his presidency.

headline.main: Trump Steps Up Attack on Judge, Court System Over Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Trump Steps Up Attack on Judge, Court System Over Travel Ban

docs.snippet: A fast-moving legal fight over President Trump’s targeted travel ban reached the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit late Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A fast-moving legal fight over President Trump’s targeted travel ban reached the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit late Saturday.

headline.print_headline: A Look at Where the Case  Stands

docs.snippet: Nine Yemenis deported from the United States in the wake of U.S. President Donald Trump's travel ban were flown to Ethiopia, then taken to neighboring Djibouti, an Ethiopian government official said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nine Yemenis deported from the United States in the wake of U.S. President Donald Trump's travel ban were flown to Ethiopia, then taken to neighboring Djibouti, an Ethiopian government official said on Friday.

headline.main: Nine Yemenis Deported From U.S. to Ethiopia Under Trump Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Nine Yemenis Deported From U.S. to Ethiopia Under Trump Travel Ban

docs.snippet: Air France said on Saturday it had reopened U.S.-bound flights to passengers affected by President Donald Trump's travel ban on nationals from seven Muslim-majority countries, after the executive order was temporarily suspended by a federal court....
docs.lead_paragraph: Air France said on Saturday it had reopened U.S.-bound flights to passengers affected by President Donald Trump's travel ban on nationals from seven Muslim-majority countries, after the executive order was temporarily suspended by a federal court.

headline.main: Air France Reopens U.S. Flights to Passengers Hit by Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Air France Reopens U.S. Flights to Passengers Hit by Travel Ban

docs.snippet: Iraq's prime minister has squashed a move by pro-Iranian factions in his government who wanted to retaliate against President Donald Trump's travel ban. The struggle shows the difficult position the Iraqi leader finds himself in – pulled bet...
docs.lead_paragraph: Iraq's prime minister has squashed a move by pro-Iranian factions in his government who wanted to retaliate against President Donald Trump's travel ban. The struggle shows the difficult position the Iraqi leader finds himself in – pulled between his most powerful neighbor and the United States under Trump.

headline.main: Abadi Fends Off Calls by Iran Allies in Iraq to React to Trump Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Abadi Fends Off Calls by Iran Allies in Iraq to React to Trump Travel Ban

docs.snippet: Hundreds of New York City bodegas, grocery stores and restaurants owned by Yemeni Americans closed for hours on Thursday in protest against U.S. President Donald Trump's immigration policies, organizers said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of New York City bodegas, grocery stores and restaurants owned by Yemeni Americans closed for hours on Thursday in protest against U.S. President Donald Trump's immigration policies, organizers said.

headline.main: Yemeni-Americans Shut Hundreds of Shops in New York City to Protest Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Yemeni-Americans Shut Hundreds of Shops in New York City to Protest Travel Ban

docs.snippet: U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said on Wednesday that U.S. President Donald Trump's travel restrictions on people with passports from seven countries and a freeze on refugee resettlement was "not the best way to protect the U.S." and shou...
docs.lead_paragraph: U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres said on Wednesday that U.S. President Donald Trump's travel restrictions on people with passports from seven countries and a freeze on refugee resettlement was "not the best way to protect the U.S." and should be lifted sooner than later.

headline.main: U.N. Chief Says Trump Travel Ban 'Not Best Way to Protect U.S.'
headline.print_headline: U.N. Chief Says Trump Travel Ban 'Not Best Way to Protect U.S.'

docs.snippet: An Iranian man turned away from Los Angeles International Airport under President Donald Trump's executive order barring immigrants from seven Muslim-majority nations returned Thursday to an emotional welcome from family members who greeted him wi...
docs.lead_paragraph: An Iranian man turned away from Los Angeles International Airport under President Donald Trump's executive order barring immigrants from seven Muslim-majority nations returned Thursday to an emotional welcome from family members who greeted him with California-grown flowers and well-wishers who sang "This Land Is Your Land."

headline.main: Man Sent Back to Iran Under Trump Travel Ban Returns to US
headline.print_headline: Man Sent Back to Iran Under Trump Travel Ban Returns to US

docs.snippet: A Detroit-area woman whose son told television stations that she died because President Donald Trump's travel ban prevented her from returning to the U.S. for medical care actually died several days before the order was signed, the leader of a mos...
docs.lead_paragraph: A Detroit-area woman whose son told television stations that she died because President Donald Trump's travel ban prevented her from returning to the U.S. for medical care actually died several days before the order was signed, the leader of a mosque said.

headline.main: Imam Disputes Man's Claim That Mom Died Due to Travel Ban
headline.print_headline: Imam Disputes Man's Claim That Mom Died Due to Travel Ban

docs.snippet: U.S. President Donald Trump will likely face questions about  his executive order restricting some travel to the United States when he meets with the CEOs of major U.S. companies at the White House on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Donald Trump will likely face questions about  his executive order restricting some travel to the United States when he meets with the CEOs of major U.S. companies at the White House on Friday.

headline.main: Trump Likely to Face Questions Over Travel Ban in Meeting With CEOs
headline.print_headline: Trump Likely to Face Questions Over Travel Ban in Meeting With CEOs
